revision.comment: Added screen category to the article.
revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static double '''GetAspectRatio'''()
== Usage == Used to get the aspect ratio of the screen. This does not take the view port into account but will take forced aspect ratios into account.
=== Return value === Returns the current aspect ratio of the screen.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Screen]]
